column1: How can we explain the strategies of companies such as AirBnB or Uber? Should employers pay their employees on the basis of results? How can we reduce poverty and inequality in emerging countries? Could the Euro crisis have been avoided?These are just some of the practical economic and social issues that you as an economist will be aiming to address.
